Are you sure to cancel the installation?
Installation was cancelled by user
Invalid APK files selected
Installation was blocked
Unable to install the app because it conflicts with an already installed app with same package name
Installation Failed
Application is incompatible with this device
Not enough storage space to install the app
Installation Completed Successfully
Allows a system app to access notifications
Required by an Accessibility Service, to ensure that only the system can bind to it
Change notification volume
Receive a broadcast indicating that the system has finished booting
Access data from sensors that the user uses to measure what is happening inside his/her body, such as heart rate
Allows an application to initiate a phone call without going through the Dialer user interface for the user to confirm the call
Required to be able to access the camera device
Allows applications to change Wi-Fi connectivity state
Allows an app to access approximate location
Allows an application to request deleting packages
Allows an application to access precise location
Allows access to the list of accounts in the Accounts Service
Allows an application to access the GPS
Allows an application to install packages
Allows an application to access mute the microphone
Allows an application to received Signal Strength and Cell ID location
Allows an application to post notifications
Allows an application to see the number being dialed during an outgoing call with the option to redirect the call to a different number or abort the call altogether
Allows an application to read the user\'s calendar data
Allows an application to read the user\'s call log
Read contents of the clipboard service
Allows an application to read the user\'s contacts data
Allows an application to read from external storage
Allows read access to the device\'s phone number(s). This is a subset of the capabilities granted by READ_PHONE_STATE but is exposed to instant applications

Allows read only access to phone state, including the phone number of the device, current cellular network information, the status of any ongoing calls, and a list of any phone accounts registered on the device
Allows an application to read SMS messages
Allows an application to monitor incoming MMS messages
Allows an application to receive SMS messages
Allows an application to receive Emergency SMS messages
Allows an application to receive WAP push messages
Allows an application to record audio
Change ring volume
Allows an application to run in the background
Start foreground services. Requires FOREGROUND_SERVICE permission
Create windows and show them on top of all other apps
Allows an application to be the only one holding audio focus
Show short duration messages on screen
Description for \'%s\' is not available
Allows an application to collect component usage statistics
Use device supported biometric modalities
Allows an app to use fingerprint hardware
Allows access to the vibrator
Use PowerManager WakeLocks to keep processor from sleeping or screen from dimming
Allows an application to access scan WiFi networks
Allows an application to write the user\'s calendar data
Allows an application to write (but not read) the user\'s call log data
Write data to the clipboard
Allows an application to write the user\'s contacts data
Read or write the system settings (there are limitations)
Allows an application to send SMS messages
Allows an application to write to external storage
Allows an application to set the wallpaper
Translate %s
Translations

Important: This application uses a lot of strings from sCommon, an open-source library sharing common code-base for most of the projects made by this developer. Hence, in-order to use this app completely in your language, please consider translating the library as well.
Help me to translate this app. Click here to visit POEditor localization project
